design_philosophy.visual_metaphor: Digital Evidence Board & Secret Case Files
core_principles: No boring grids - use 'messy' investigation board layouts
Texture is king - grain, paper, stamps
Dark mode default - it's a secret operation

font_scaling.h2: text-3xl md:text-4xl tracking-widest uppercase border-b-2 border-red-600 inline-block rotate-1

typography.installation_instructions: Add these Google Fonts to index.html: <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Black+Ops+One&family=Courier+Prime:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400&family=Special+Elite&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous padding (p-8, p-12) to simulate a desk surface
layout_strategies.z_index_layering: High usage of z-index to stack 'photos' and 'notes' over each other

buttons.primary: bg-maverick-red text-white font-special-elite uppercase tracking-widest px-6 py-3 border-2 border-transparent hover:border-white hover:rotate-1 transition-all shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(255,255,255,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent text-maverick-yellow border-2 border-maverick-yellow font-courier-prime uppercase hover:bg-maverick-yellow hover:text-black transition-all

cards.member_profile: bg-maverick-paper border border-stone-700 p-4 shadow-xl rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform relative overflow-hidden group
cards.evidence_photo: bg-white p-2 pb-8 shadow-lg rotate-[-2deg] hover:rotate-0 transition-all text-black font-handwriting text-center
cards.note: bg-yellow-200 text-black font-handwriting p-4 shadow-md rotate-1 w-64 absolute

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a fixed background noise overlay: 'fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-50 opacity-[0.03] bg-[url("https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg")]'
visual_enhancers.stamps: CSS border-double with stenciled text for 'CONFIDENTIAL' or 'TOP SECRET' stamps
visual_enhancers.tape: Small rectangular div with semi-transparent white/yellow background, rotated 45deg, placed on corners of images

motion.entrance: framer-motion: initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.9, rotate: -5 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1, rotate: 0 }} transition={{ type: 'spring' }}
motion.typewriter: Use a typewriter effect library for headings to simulate data being printed

specific_page_instructions.landing: Must feel like opening a physical dossier. Big 'CONFIDENTIAL' stamp animation. Enter button says 'OPEN FILE'.
specific_page_instructions.member_grid: Not a clean grid. A 'suspect board'. Items slightly scattered/rotated. Red strings connecting them (optional/svg).
specific_page_instructions.timeline: Vertical line with 'evidence' attached to it. Dates look like timestamps.
specific_page_instructions.gallery: Polaroids scattered on a table surface.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure red text is only used on dark backgrounds if it meets 4.5:1, otherwise use it for borders/accents. Main text should be off-white (#E5E5E5) on black.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable rotation animations if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'framer-motion' for drag constraints (evidence board feel).
Install 'lucide-react' for icons (File, Search, Lock, Siren).
Create a 'Sticker' component that looks like a piece of tape or a stamp.
Do not make it look clean. It should look organized but 'lived in'.
